description: What remains of http://anidb.net/ch83473 [Illyasviel von Einzbern]`s body, after her soul was extracted from her body by http://anidb.net/ch81975 [Angelica] and placed into a http://anidb.net/ch83943 [teddy bear]. Angelica inserted a "dummy" soul to operate Illya`s body while Illya`s soul is trapped in the teddy bear.
name: Karadasviel von Einzbern
